price: 24. Manso ya ye; masuwa maye mazali kotambola likolo ya ebale lokola bangomba.
arabic: وَلَهُ ٱلۡجَوَارِ ٱلۡمُنشَـَٔاتُ فِي ٱلۡبَحۡرِ كَٱلۡأَعۡلَٰمِ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: walahu al-jawāri al-munshaātu fī al-baḥri kal-aʿlāmi
